about_the_game:
The game supports Free Multiplayer CO-OP. Join our Discord community (click discord icon on the right panel) to claim multiplayer code and start free trial. Moreover, complete special holiday tasks for an exclusive avatars and weapons!

Pixel Dungeon: Prologue is an multiplayer co-op rogue-lite dungeon exploration game with captivating pixel art style. Grab your weapons and venture into randomly generated dungeons for a thrilling adventure. Explore endless excitement on this heart-pounding journey!

👐 Solo Or Co-op

Solo exploration or 3-player team-up. Co-op multiplayer enhances your gaming experience with smarter battle strategies, real-time teammate guidance, and integrated voice chat for seamless coordination.

🕌 Endless Dungeons

Explore randomly generated dungeons in the pixel world, offering a new challenge with each adventure. Discover elite rooms, intricate mazes, and easter egg chambers!

⚔️ Immersive Combat Experience

Real-time combat and interactive physics simulation bring unparalleled realism. Choose, mix and match from 10+ weapons—snipe with a crossbow, wield a heavy sword, throw axes, wield a magic wand... Navigate dangerous spike traps, precarious floating bridges, and deadly minefields. Time your moves to stun enemies and collaborate with teammates to defeat bosses!

🐱‍👤 Diverse Avatars

Start with 30 avatars, with more designs to be determined by players. Unleash your imagination and share your ideas in Discord!

🌟 Growth System

Talent: Utilize the talent system to upgrade different abilities, enhance combat prowess, unlock new skills and items.

Weapon Crafting: Forge your own legendary gear by upgrading weapons or rerolling their attributes.

name: Pixel Dungeon VR: Prologue (CO-OP)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA®GeForce® GTX 1650s / AMD Radeon™ RX5300
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • VR Support: Open XR，requires motion controllers. Support Valve Index, Quest 2 and Quest 3
  • Additional Notes: VR Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Pixel Dungeon: Prologue is a multiplayer co-op rogue-lite dungeon exploration game with captivating pixel style. Join Discord to unlock multiplayer and complete special in-game tasks for an exclusive avatars and weapons!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
*languages with full audio support
